item.description:
Drive out King George and his band of parliamentary cretins!

Resolve to attend the Boston Sons of Liberty Film Festival at The Democracy Center in Cambridge.

Sunday, April 29th, 12:00pm - 10:00pm.

Topics include Agent Provocateur and COINTELPRO Subversion, Foundations of the So-Called 'War on Terrorism', Soldiers' Rebellion, the Fed's Fraudulant Financial System and its Ramifications for Our Republic.

If you want to end the wars, you need to know why they started.

Bring your friends, network with others.

Free admission and popcorn!
